tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HighPotentialEmployees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  performance_rating FLOAT,
  career_progression VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    department TEXT,
    position TEXT,
    performance_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE career_progression (
    progression_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    promotion_date DATE,
    previous_position TEXT,
    new_position TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE,
  performance_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  salary DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  completed BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE promotions (
  promotion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  promotion_date DATE,
  new_role VARCHAR(50),
  previous_role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    metric_value FLOAT,
    metric_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY(employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE CareerProgression (
    progression_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    job_title VARCHAR(50),
    promotion_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY(employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE PotentialEmployees (
    potential_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    potential_score FLOAT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY(employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    employee_id INT,
    performance_rating INT,
    project_completion_rate FLOAT,
    last_appraisal DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE career_progression (
    employee_id INT,
    promotion_date DATE,
    previous_position VARCHAR(50),
    new_position VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE training_records (
    employee_id INT,
    training_type VARCHAR(50),
    training_date DATE,
    duration_hours INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE high_potential_employees (
    employee_id INT,
    potential_score FLOAT,
    identified_date DATE,
    reason TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
)
